thread.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoilers! Kartik & Naira’s Relationship In Trouble Post Marriage!
thread.title_full: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoilers! Kartik & Naira’s Relationship In Trouble Post Marriage!

title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoilers! Kartik & Naira’s Relationship In Trouble Post Marriage!
text:
» Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoilers! Kartik & Naira’s Relationship In Trouble Post Marriage! Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoilers! Kartik & Naira’s Relationship In Trouble Post Marriage! Read on to know why Kartik and Naira’s relationship is in trouble post marriage on Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. Published:   18:19   
The makers of Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai didn't leave any stone unturned to make Kartik ( Mohsin Khan ) and Naira's (Shivangi Joshi) wedding look real and grand. The makers have also succeeded to get their lost TRPs as well. The show is back on top five slot. A month long 'KaIra' wedding is finally over. What will be the story after this marriage? Well, there are various stories doing the rounds. Have a look at spoilers and our predictions... Spoiler 1 
According to the latest reports, post Kartik and Naira's marriage, the Goenkas' will arrange for a grand reception party. Kartik and Naira will look their best during the reception. But, there will be major drama during the party. Spoiler 2 
Kartik will be super excited about their honeymoon, but Naira spoils it! Apparently, she wants to spend more time with the family to know them better and cancels honeymoon. This upsets Kartik. Spoiler 3 
Apparently, Naira will try to mend Kartik's relationship with his parents - Manish and Suvarna. This will not be liked by Kartik and there will be frequent fights between the two. Spoiler 4 
Naira will try to be a perfect bahu. Apparently, she wants to win everybody's heart and ignores Kartik. This annoys Kartik and there will be cracks in their relationship. Spoiler 5 
As the viewers know, Aditya is behind Naira. He will be happy to see Kartik and Naira fight. There may be possibility of him filling Kartik's ears as well against Naira! Prediction 1 
It is known that Naira and Naksh knows that Aditya is hurting Kriti. If Naira reveals about Aditya without any evidences, she might get into trouble. The Goenkas and even Kartik might hate her for blaming Aditya! Prediction 2 
It has to be recalled that Kartik and his family members have hidden about Mansi from Naira and her family. Apparently, Mansi would have been the main culprit for Akshara's death. If Naira gets to know about the same, she might break her relationship with Kartik! Story So Far... In the previous episode, we saw how Kriti escapes from Aditya. She asks Naksh not to tell anything about her and Aditya to the family. She also signals Naira not to tell about Aditya to Kartik. Kriti doesn't want Naira and Kartik's relationship to get affected because of her or Aditya.Kartik and Naira take seven vows in presence of their family with the holy fire as witness. The family members explain Naira and Kartik about the meaning of each pheras. Kartik fills Naira's maang. Both family members get emotional and are happy for the couple. Kartik kisses Naira and congratulate her. Kartik is on cloud nine after marrying the love of his life. Well, Kartik and Naira deserve this, as they had struggled a lot before marriage. Naira thinks how her life changed in last one year. How the person she hated the most, changed her life for good. She thanks 'Ganga mayya' for making her meet Kartik.Naira and Kartik take Dadi and other family members' blessings. She also makes Kartik take Manish and Suvarna's blessings. Kartik's parents get emotional.Stay locked to this space for the latest updates... Other articles published on Mar 23, 2017 Please Wait while comments are loading...
